column2: Container Position Equipment Instance Identifier Type
Cont Dock Loc Component Equipment Instance ID
Cont Dock Loc Component Equipment Instance Identifier Type
Gross Weight Measure Unit of Measure
Logical Container Equipment Instance Identifier Type
Net Weight Measure Unit of Measure
Operating Component Equipment Instance Identifier Type
Physical Container Equipment Instance Identifier Type
Piece Routing Setting Group Identifier Type
The Visa reference data ID for this Mail sort machine (MPS)
The name of the facility where the container event occurred.
The unique identifier of the container Label(Bag/ULD). Generated by the MPS when the label is printed.
(Tray/Bag/ULD) Destination identifier. 8 digit number that can be used to identify the contents and destination of the product within the container.
Visa reference data identifier for the mail destination.
Sub Destination that appears on the label.
Numeric Identifier of the Mail Destination State, e.g. 2 = NSW, 3 = VIC, 4 = QLD etc.
Indicates the type of Mail destination e.g. MC = Mail Centre, DC = Delivery Centre, PDC = Parcel Delivery Centre etc
6 digit WCIS Code for the labels mail destination.
Delivery Centre Code (3 character alpha numeric identifier of the labels destination e.g. DLC, VIC, MEL etc).
Delivery Centre Name (Description associated with the delivery centre code).
Identifier for the type of Delivery Centre Code, e.g. IAT, EPC, MN1, MN2 etcâ€¦
Visa reference data identifier of the Parent Mail Destination.
Parent Mail Destination, for the labels Mail Destination.
4 digit identifier of the labels product type.
Abbreviated description of the labels product type e.g. Small Parcel.
A description of the labels product e.g.: SP - Mixed Bag Interstate.
Mail Size Indicator for the product type e.g. 'SP'
Identifier for the delivery service for the labels product type.
2 digit code when combined with barcode preamble, uniquely identifies the mail category for the product.
Mail Category for the product. Describes the product and process e.g. SP Weigh Out.
First 4 digits of the label barcode.
The type of time field to be printed on the label.
Visa reference data identifier for the national operating standard.
Additional line of text (i.e. text line 3) that may be present on the label.
The name of the label format being used to print the label.
